title:
How can  Coach Noble at West Brunswick High School and his daughter use school facilites to give pitching and hitting lesson?  They also charge $20.00 for 30 min. 

 

How can Joe Noble have a monopoly on softball for brunswick county in school, parks & rec. travel ball?
